search_information.query_displayed: Achievement and Segregation in Secondary Schools: A Further Look at Public and Private School Differences. Coleman, James S. And Others. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: Achievement and segregation in secondary schools: A further look at public and private school differences
organic_results.snippet: There have been reviews in other places concerning our work on public and private schools, but none has been as extensive as the set of reviews included in this issue, and none has gone into such full technical detail as these. Consequently, these reviews allow both a more intense examination of the empirical results of our analysis than has been possible before and a deeper examination of the technical issues-which have been raised not only here, but elsewhere-than has been possible before. Because of the urgency of time, because we saw …

publication_info.summary: J Coleman, T Hoffer, S Kilgore - Sociology of education, 1982 - JSTOR
